Translations.Text: ya eyyuhe-nnebiyyu kul limen fi eydikum mine-l'esra iy ya`lemi-llahu fi kulubikum hayray yu'tikum hayram mimma uhize minkum veyagfir lekum. vellahu gafurur rahim
veiy yuridu hiyaneteke fekad hanu-llahe min kablu feemkene minhum. vellahu `alimun hakim

inne-llezine amenu vehaceru vecahedu biemvalihim veenfusihim fi sebili-llahi vellezine evev venesaru ulaike ba`duhum evliyau ba`d. vellezine amenu velem yuhaciru ma lekum miv velayetihim min sey'in hatta yuhaciru. veini-stensarukum fi-ddini fe`aleykumu-nnasru illa `ala kavmim beynekum vebeynehum misakun. vellahu bima ta`melune besir
vellezine keferu ba`duhum evliyau ba`d. illa tef`aluhu tekun fitnetun fi-l'ardi vefesadun kebir
vellezine amenu vehaceru vecahedu fi sebili-llahi vellezine evev venesaru ulaike humu-lmu'minune hakka. lehum magfiratuv verizkun kerim
vellezine amenu mim ba`du vehaceru vecahedu me`akum feulaike minkum. veulu-l'erhami ba`duhum evla biba`din fi kitabi-llah. inne-llahe bikulli sey'in `alim
